oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Glimpses of Nashville, Tennessee: A Leading Dry Goods Store
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An illustrated drawing of “A Leading Dry Goods Store,” the J.E. Manix Dry Goods Company, a business located in Nashville’s retail district circa 1900s. The J.E. Manix Dry Goods Company was a large retail merchandise store located at 320 Church Street in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. The handwritten notation refers to the “Kirkman Block” and the illustration depicts shoppers and a horse-drawn carriage in front of the store. Forms part of Glimpses of Nashville. 1 booklet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: J.E. Manix Dry Goods Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
